website_summaries.verdict: Milk-based formula with extra nutrients make it a good choice for parents that want a formula that's as close to breast milk as possible.
pros: Contains nutrients like DHA/ARA, iron, lutein, and probiotics for optimum health benefit
Works well for babies with reflux
cons: Could cause constipation in some babies

customer_reviews.title: Major constipation.
customer_reviews.text: Made my baby super constipated. This is the only brand that has done that. I even tried diluting it with pre-made formula and pre-mixing it so the powder would have ample time to fully dissolve. Organic is a nice idea but not when your baby is in excruciating intestinal pain.
customer_reviews.author: jpau00

customer_reviews.title: Gas creating formula for infant
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and My little one throws up because when I make actual formula from this ,it creates too much bubble and gives gas problem to infant and he throws up..so I changed his formula to other brand and he is fine.In between I just try earth formula 2-3 times during week interval ,and it happens always and that what confirmed that earth create lots of bubble and gas problem.so
customer_reviews.author: H.G.Suhagiya

customer_reviews.title: Caused Constipation
customer_reviews.text: Based off other reviews and ingredients, I believe this formula may still be a good option for some parents. All babies are different and unfortunately this formula made our son extremely constipated. I spoke with a nurse who suggested it’s the added iron. But when I compared the amount of iron in this formula to his current formula, it was the same. I’m sure the way in which each brand of formula is broken down is different, but I was initially thinking we were making a lateral move. I just wanted to mention the iron in case anyone else is researching to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best formula
customer_reviews.text: We searched diligently for something we could feel good about giving our child. Milk production stopped early and the market is saturated with questionable mixes. This is the most affordable natural ingredient and best mix for your baby. We’ve been so pleased with this product over everything else. We tried options from us and even goats milk because of its similarities to human breast milk . This is the most affordable, easily accessible , etc. it smells pretty bad and tastes about the same but our boy absolutely loves it. We add vitamin c tabs that freshen it up but he’s happy And healthy and that’s what matters
customer_reviews.author: Coyoteduce

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fishy
customer_reviews.text: Formula tastes so fishy. My daughter will not drink it. I tried it and couldn't stop gagging
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Florea

customer_reviews.title: Save even more with a subscription for delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is a real quality formula. My baby is only 3 months old and she’s been using this for months. It’s milk based and organic and has no corn syrup solids. In the formula world, that’s Cadillac quality. She hasn’t had any cholic, consolation or diarrhea. Yes, I’m a lucky dad. For so many other reasons too! This isn’t the cheapest formula but consideeing that it is organic, fortified with Iron and the amazon price is 30% less than the supermarket. Easy call.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rotondo

customer_reviews.title: Baby boys favorite formula
customer_reviews.text: This was the first formula my baby boy had. We ran out of it one day before more arrived, so I went to the store for some, and they didn't have this, some other major brand. He gets super excited/impatient when he sees us making a bottle, and instantly content when he gets it to his lips. However, he was not pleased when he tasted the other brand. He shot me a v er ra disapproving look. So, we just stick to Earth's Best Organic. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: El Karto Diablo

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this formula and it has the best ingredients of any other formula I can find. It has never upset his tummy or made him gassy. We started mixing it with breast milk when my supply just wasn’t enough anymore and now he will take just formula or a mix with breast milk and doesn’t seem to mind either. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Bug infested formula
customer_reviews.text: This formula was horrible. After a few days of use I noticed bugs at the bottom that i later found out could be meal worms or weavels. These bugs aren’t harmful to babies but are still disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Alternative to Breastfeeding♡
customer_reviews.text: We Came Upon This product because we had tried several others and did not like the results that came from them. Our little guy was allergic to Enfamil. And the honest brand of formula was a little bit too pricey for the amount that you received. We subbed in this formula throughout his first year when I was unable to breastfeed and was pleased with the results. We've continued to use this formula after his first year and still love it! We've recommended it to a few family and friends and they've been pleased as well♡
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: FISHY!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I opened the can, I gagged and I knew right away that my son will hate it. The smell got worse after I mixed it, very fishy, almost spoiled like the smell of breastmilk after leave out for a while. My son pushed the bottle away and spit out any of the milk got in his mouth. This is my first time buying formula, based on lots of reviews, I don't know if the other products of Earth's Best taste/smell the same, but pretty disappointed with this one (Red can). Now I can't return, no idea what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Good for supplementing
customer_reviews.text: We started using this formula to supplement when our baby was just 2 weeks old. The first few times she had it she was a bit gassy but it wasn't too bad. She has been having about 2-6oz a day to top her off after b.feeding for a few weeks now and it is going great. I highly recommend this formula for all the supplementing mamas out there.
customer_reviews.author: Madrecita

customer_reviews.title: Our family's favorite
customer_reviews.text: We started supplementing with Formula at about 7 months, and this ended up being my favorite. It was well received by my son, although he didn't really seem to have issues with taste or reaction to any formula we tried. I like that it is supplemented with DHA/ARA, and I have a science background so I wasn't really intimidated by some of the talk about algae source of these compounds. I appreciated that it mixed better with water than the Baby's Only brand when I tried that, plus it is organic but not an insane price and it can be found at local stores (i.e., Target) if needed quicker than Amazon could deliver. So overall it was our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay, love it
customer_reviews.text: They are good but no for my baby , so we shift to eart best but the sensitivity version the purple one, still one of the best formula out there for babies if you care about your baby food quality, little price but you get what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Arslanian

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this formula! Not only is it low in cost compared to other organic formulas, but also doesn’t stink as bad as other organic formulas. We’ve tried similac (which caused my daughter to throw up and spit up in enormous amounts-she was nearly spitting up everything she ate) and didn’t like it, we’ve tried the Walmart brand that is organic and she had GERD symptoms with that also. This formula is the only organic formula we’ve found that seems to be easily digestible for her tummy. Love this product- including the baby food and pouches!
customer_reviews.author: Ally E

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Formula
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old loves this stuff! This was the only formula he would drink when transitioning from breastmilk so it must taste okay (I have not tried it). I love the quality of ingredients. When mixing with water, the formula does get pretty frothy, but it doesn't seem to bother my baby. I wish one can weren't so expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Second order was bad
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this for my newborn I was very happy with it.. the second time I bought I was going to send it back because it smelled awful .. nothing like the first time. We ended up running to the store to get something else. I wanted to send it back but my husband tossed it. I have always loved earths best products so I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: martyz4

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I have this for back-up in case she’s not satisfied with what I’m making. Fortunately I’ve only had to use it a few times (I only say it that way because I wanted to EBF and kinda felt like a failure for using formula, but that’s just me!) anyways, she loved it! Didn’t seem to upset her at all, not while drinking, nor afterwards (no signs of constipation or anything).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The iron is very strong!!!! Still great it’s just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.text: Great savings for the quality ingredients. The iron is horrible. My son still breastfeeds 80% of the time and weaning. He will tolerate it at times and others spits it out. The iron is very strong. Be advised they do sell without this.
customer_reviews.author: The Walls Household

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fishy
customer_reviews.text: Fishy smell and taste. Baby doesnt like it and toddler won’t even sip. Obviously DHA is important and maybe hard to source; but this Waste of money as its not drinkable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dog food
customer_reviews.text: Like a similar review, I also wanted to like this product and my baby refused to eat it. For a few days I couldn't figure out why. When I took a sniff, I was shocked by the smell. It smelled exactly like dog food. No wonder she didn't want to eat it. :( I just hope I didn't poison my baby. So disappointing to spend top dollar on this organic product to throw it in the garbage and have my baby crying with gas and stomach pains and refusing to eat. Makes my heart sick.
customer_reviews.author: Cg

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves the taste of it, did not like Enfamil. Baby will easily go back and forth between this and breast. The ingredients are good, not mysterious like in some conventional formulas.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: The best formula
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is doing so well on this, no more gas or spit ups or constapation, I do beleive the 2 companys Infamil and Similac have tryed to buy almost all shelf space and throw tons of money in to the wic program also receive huge amounts from the wic program in order to prevent this company from being more available, babies do better on quality ingredients rather than the oil and high fructose garbage that is put into Similac and Infamil, those companys are absolutley corrupt and run by liberals who think only big bank not for the benifit of young babies.
customer_reviews.author: ETHEL M

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: It is terrible to find something Gross on top of infants food, and wet container, I have subscribed this formula since one year, because my daughter likes it , now I'm very disappointed, returning this right now and going to cancel subscription,
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great organic formula.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this same formula for 3 1/2 yrs. would never use anything different, unless they quit making this! No funky smell, no funky taste (yes I've tasted this on numerous occasions). while obviously not as delicious as chocolate milk, lol, it's a baby's main source of nutrition and does the job very well. Both of my babies were on this, without any incidents, or reactions (I DID try the soy one, it constipated my boy badly, so I switched back to the red can) Plus, the company has a rewards program for using their products. Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Jule J

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: My baby wouldn’t take formula for months and months (mostly breastfed). We got a few servings from a friend before buying this and baby drank it all down! It claims for flavor to be closest to breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great for supplementing
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively pump and supplement some of this formula and my baby has had no problems with it so far. It took him a few weeks to get used to the taste (tastes like high lipase breastmilk) and it’s has a sort of bad smell but it doesn’t bother me anymore. It is very foamy/frothy though. I feel good about it because it’s organic and has no corn syrup!!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Use this for gassy babies
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn baby was having terrible gas so we tried a few different formulas. This one was the clear winner and our baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Ost

customer_reviews.title: Best formula
customer_reviews.text: Since my daughter was born I had trouble finding the best formula for her since I was able to breastfeed and we tried like 3 other formulas and she always had problems with spit up, and diarrhea but the first week she was doing great. Minor spit up not explosive diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: The best organic choice
customer_reviews.text: We left the hospital using Similac AdvanceShield but it is important to us that our son's formula be organic. We switched to Similac Organic. That product is more widely available (including at [...]) and that was attractive to us. However, our son became very constipated and his stool became dry and rabbit pellet-like! We were also concerned with the type of sugar that Similac Organic contains. Finally, when mixed from powder we found that formula grainy. We switched to Earth's Best and the consipaton resolved quickly and we love how it mixes up. This is the best choice in organic formulas!
customer_reviews.author: Pisatelnaya

customer_reviews.title: Great Formula for Infants
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding formula. We have used it for both of our kids. They loved the taste and it did not mess with their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I change 3 formula do my baby, this one is good for her. But have little smell of fish oil
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my baby
customer_reviews.text: This formula made my baby very grassy. It gave him bad diarrhea. It made him cry a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some gas problems
customer_reviews.text: This formula is good organic is always the way to go if you ask me it did give my baby some gas troubles, but sence im only supplementing formula 1-2 times a day I continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Meliha B.

customer_reviews.title: What is in your formula?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for both my babies and they enjoyed it. I like the way it mixes easily and has no artificial chemical crap in it. Both my kids are extremely healthy. I'm very particular about the foods they eat
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Compared to honest company the best value
customer_reviews.text: My favorite organic formula now. It is a better product at a better price for organic formula.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: 4oz mix will make 1oz of unwanted foam
customer_reviews.text: Similar to Similac but extra extra foamy when mixed. It a real pain point because I have to scoop out the foam with a spoon before hand. 4oz mix will result in 1oz foam.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great formula for our babies!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter since she was 6 Months had to be supplemented and this was our first and last try with finding a formula she would like. We have had no problems and she does so wel wkth it! She is now 10 Months and we couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: WiMom528

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy organic formula
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this formula for around seven months now and the twins like it. You have to shake it quite a bit more than similac organic, but I think that's fine. My one beef with buying this via amazon is quite often the scoop settles near the bottom and you have to dig around for it - once I wanted to dump the can out to look for the scoop! You might want to save your scoop for the next can incase it's buried
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!! Cheapest on amazon, especially with the subscription! 2/month works for us
customer_reviews.text: Easier to digest than others, very little gas with this product. I reccomend this product to all mothers that need to supplement or feed formula!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany & Drew

customer_reviews.title: Strong iron flavor
customer_reviews.text: My baby didn’t like this. I tried it myself and it had a very strong iron flavor made me want to vomit. Had to throw it away, she refused to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizet Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my son. He’s nursing but my supply isn’t enough so we supplement a little. After a long it reading on different formulas, this is definitely one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Organic!
customer_reviews.text: We love this formula! We continue to get it over and over. It does have a stronger smell to it but the taste doesn’t seem to bother my child and I love that it’s organic!
customer_reviews.author: Savewithbrit

customer_reviews.title: Great formula to help with colic!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always had colic as an infant and this was the only milk that helped lessen the colic. She was on this milk even after turning one. Her pediatrician said I could leave her on this until 1 1/2 which is what I did. It's a bit pricier than Infamol but well worth the price in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best out there!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has been on this formula since she was one month old and there's no way we can switch to anything else. With this formula we have had no problems at all no throwing up, no belly aches,and she loves it . We love everything about this formula
customer_reviews.author: Brittany stow

customer_reviews.title: Best at Krogers
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our son, it helped him poop
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. And i love knowing it’s healthy
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Easy transition from breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I switched from breastfeeding to this formula exclusively and my baby had no problems with gas or any fussiness. It feels good to know I'm giving her a quality product that doesnt break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Good Fomula
customer_reviews.text: My infant seemed to like this formula just fine. Didn't use a ton of it, but did when I went on a couple vacations while she was still nursing and it worked well. I felt good feeding it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Breastfed baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My breastfed 10-month-old started this formula at 7 months after being EBF. His tummy has never seemed upset or gassy, which is something I was worried about. He has some breast milk and some Earth's Best formula every day, and switches back and forth with no issues. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I think this formula upsets my babies tummy. It clumps. I’m going to try the gentle version.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Riojas

customer_reviews.title: Smell and taste fishy
customer_reviews.text: I guess the added DHA makes the formula taste fishy... Unfortunately my baby can't get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: I guess its okay. but it made my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess its okay. but it made my daughter VERY VERY constipated. this was her first formula after being breast fed for 8 months. i won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best formula we have tried
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best formula I have found. My little one was spitting up constantly, could hardly keep other brands down. Finally tried this one and he hardly spits up. Only downfall is it does make him constipated. I just add a little prune juice to his diet though and hes back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Product but my daughter didn't take to it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a lot of spit up with this one. I think they make a great product, so I don't want to knock it....my little one just didn't take to it like I wanted her too. We were originally on Similac and I wanted something organic....we tried baby one (I think it is called) and the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Greentexan

customer_reviews.title: Nice formula
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula! Breastfed my baby for 11 months and this is the next best thing. So handy I can order off amazon when I’m running low
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! My son hasn't had any problems with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! My son hasn't had any problems with this formula. I will be buying their toddler formula as well. I will use again for my second child in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby formula.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this formula along with breast feeding for all three of my kids and have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves the taste
customer_reviews.text: We went through FIVE other formula's before trying this one because our baby refused to drink the others. She didn't like the taste or the consistency. I tried the other formulas myself and they all tasted like chalk mixed with water. Earth's Best dissolves the best and tastes the closest to real breast milk. Our baby loves it and is back to drinking like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: RussB

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: When my breastmilk dried up 11 months pp I was super disappointed that Id have to feed my little formula, but surprisingly she took this this really well! If I have to give my babe formula, I want it to be from a brand I trust
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to nurse my daughter for about 10 months. So, for the last few months of her first year we had to resort to formula. Of course, I went with a name I knew I could trust. Earth's Best is the top of the line when it comes to organic formula. At our local co-op, it is about $6 more than from Amazon, including shipping and tax!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby seems happy with this, and it is available at Target too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Earth's Best is an understatement !
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has allergies to cow's milk. This formula has been a God send for him . His skin is so much improved, and he has been able to keep his feedings down, which has helped him gain weight ! Great product !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about this formula. Made my baby constipated ...
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about this formula. Made my baby constipated. Switched her over to HIPP formula and she is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Carro

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula! My baby doesn't spit up or have upset stomach from this formula. Doesn't smell bad like other formulas. I won't feed anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sochor

customer_reviews.title: my baby loves it, so do I
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes it. She actually started preferring it over breastmilk (beware). But she likes it, it doesn't upset her tummy, and I like that it's organic and one of the best formulas out there that are readily available and "reasonably" priced - especially with Amazon's Subscribe & Save. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Great Formula, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this formula. We go through a can a month, no other formula compares.
customer_reviews.author: Sharif

customer_reviews.title: Son didn't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't like the taste of this. It doesn't smell as nice as other formulas... and according to a friend who volunteered to taste test our formulas, it tastes the worst out of all of them. It's not to say it's not a good formula, just didn't suit our little guys taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the organic aspect
customer_reviews.text: Love the organic aspect. No different than any other formula as far as I can tell. Bought on sale, and otherwise a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Anngie22

customer_reviews.title: Too much foam causes colic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after doing some research on organic formulas, and feel compelled to write a review. The powder does NOT mix well. In order to mix, you have to shake hard - this causes excessive foam bubbles. Those bubbles create bad gas/colic for baby. Switched to Happy Baby formula and noticed a difference immediately.
customer_reviews.author: BKT

customer_reviews.title: My kid ate this and now she is bloody brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My kid ate this when my wife's milk gave out. She is 1.5 years old and reading letters/numbers, knows her shapes and colors, speaks in sentences, and does other things little kids may not do. Be ye impressed or no, my point is that this formula was a part of a normal-to-advanced child's upbringing, so buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: jsnbnks

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My son transitioned nicely to this from breast milk no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rausch Family

customer_reviews.title: healthy for babies when they dodo0
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product for my baby. I balance breast milk and Earth's Best Dairy Baby Formula - Powder and my baby dodoo still comes out soft and yellow color ;no constipation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foamy
customer_reviews.text: Had high expectations but the formula was very foamy. Caused by baby stomach aches and constipation.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED!!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter had a pretty rough transition from breast to bottle... i tried other organic formulas... they either caused GAS, constipation... spit up.. YOU NAME IT! but from her first bottle of earths best shes been GREAT! i actually tried all other formulas... and EB is the only one that actually tastes like real milk and not some vitamin-eee concoction. my daughter loves it and shes thriving with it as well =) happy baby... happy mom! hands down would recommend to any mommys out there looking for a great organic alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far baby has no issues with it. Just dont shake just swirl to avoid frothy film.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiana

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is The only formula you should give your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M.

customer_reviews.title: well priced.
customer_reviews.text: Has some controversial ingredients but you give your children the best you can. Definitely better than conventional formula. Great price and is a prime item. The closest store that sells this formula is a two hour commute from my town. So it definitely saves money ordering through Amazon. Especially when I'm running low and not making a trip into the city. Baby loved it. Now he's on a hemp/ coconut blend I prepare for him.
customer_reviews.author: cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Only by organic ingredients for your family
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy anything but organic ingredients for an infant. Since they don't label GMO's all other products most likely have genetically engineered ingredients unless it is organic. Thanks for making this product with organic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Alonna Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Baby Vomitting
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake! I bought this formula first time from the store and my baby took it so well and since I have been giving the formula that was delivered from here my baby has been vomiting it all out.
customer_reviews.author: sangeeta prasad

customer_reviews.title: I hate formula, but knowing I can still go Organic makes it better
customer_reviews.text: I hate formula, but knowing I can still go Organic makes it easier for me to sleep at night. We initially tried the Earth's Best for Gas/Fussiness and ironically it seemed to create more of a problem. The original formula is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Zheilla R.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one time - after reading a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one time - after reading a lot of information on formula, I wouldn't buy this again. We now use Holle formula.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Baumer

customer_reviews.title: Organic but give constipation
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that it was organic, but it gave an horrible constipation to my daughter. It is really too bad because I was really excited about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sissi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love Earth's Best Organic formula. My grand daughter has been very fussy after each feeding. This really made a difference. I noticed that someone said they had problems with clumping. We have never experienced this. We add the warm water first and then the formula, stir and shake. Works great every time! Another reason we love it so much is because it is free from harmful chemicals found in other formulas.
customer_reviews.author: J Carter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my infant spitted almost everything. I was so excited about this product but it didn't work for my baby. I don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: wanda i. polanco

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product cans
customer_reviews.text: Damaged product delivered in unsecured box where loose cans where able to roll around and get damaged
customer_reviews.author: Tq

customer_reviews.title: great product and organic.
customer_reviews.text: My baby has liked this formula from day one, here from amazon is like 4 dlls cheaper than any other store. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: roberto perez

customer_reviews.title: Constipated baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby was very constipated on this formula. I love that it's organic so the second star is because of that. One star because my baby who I switched back to enfamil (so sad bc it's not mostly organic) didn't do well on earths best.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Levitt

customer_reviews.title: Easy on baby's tummy and safe since it's organic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only formula I have used for both of my children. My first son had a very sensitive stomach and severe reflux so I tried pretty much every formula brand since nothing seemed to stay down. I finally tried Earth's Best and it was a winner! Since I try to only feed organic and homemade food to my children, I appreciated that this formula was certified organic. It also has a much lower sugar content than other formula brands so I don't have to worry about gum or teeth health with this one! I do recommend buying a handheld formula mixer so you don't have to shake the bottle so much to dissolve it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fed is Best
customer_reviews.text: This formula makes me feel good about what’s going into my baby girls belly. She loves it, is growing healthy and strong and we’ve had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mehrtens

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I had given them a 5 but this time my products suffered a delay,but above all the milk is the best and the seller is good, I only wish could subscribe myself to this product ( but it is not allowed )
customer_reviews.author: Farela

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this formula
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this formula. My baby has half breast milk and half formula. No upset stomach. Baby poops a little more, but that's a good thing! No constipation. I haven't found a better product yet.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJay

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: my son enjoyed this. we just weaned off breast milk and he had no problems switching to this brand. Amazon offers the best deal on this product.
customer_reviews.author: cjw0219

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I know that this isn't necessarily the best of the best (like Baby's Only) but this stuff was easy on my daughter's tummy and I felt better knowing that at least I could give her something organic when I couldn't breastfeed her anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bird

customer_reviews.title: Formula win!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this formula to help supplement with breastfeeding since my son turned 10 months old. First time I tried it, I was really worried that my son will not take it as he is so used to breastmilk. Luckily, I was wrong! My son absolutely did not notice a difference and keeps taking this formula on regular basis. I like that this formula does not contain a bunch of junk that you cannot pronounce and is organic. A bonus is that it contains iron. Overall, I love buying products from Earth's Best and feel like the ingredients are worth paying a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, so easy to have it delivered to your home
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Formula!
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop nursing and chose to use Earth's Best formula partially for the convenience and price on Amazon. After using the product, I never switched. My baby rarely spit up and never had any GI problems.
customer_reviews.author: HS Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweet as the others
customer_reviews.text: We tried this with our son and while he took a couple of days to get used to it, he loved it a lot. It is not as sweet as the other formulas out there and that is the best part of it.
customer_reviews.author: samurai2011

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it and I feel good feeding it to him.
customer_reviews.text: I feel good giving this formula to my baby. Nothing too creepy in it like the big brands.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Dog of Action

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Multiple kids, tried multiple formulas. This is the only one that made transitioning from breast milk to formula seamless. Plus it's one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Sophs

product_meta.title: Earth's Best Organic Dairy Infant Powder Formula with Iron, Omega-3 DHA and Omega-6 ARA, 23.2 oz
product_meta.description:
Earth's Best Organic Infant Formula With DHA & ARA Is Made With High Quality Protein, Carbohydrates, Vitamins, Minerals and Essential Fatty Acids, Including Omega 3 Dha and Omega 6 ARA Fatty Acids, Special Nutrients Found in Breast Milk Clinically Shown to Be Critical to Baby's Mental and Visual Development. If You Choose Formula, Even If Just to Supplement Breastfeeding, This Easy to Digest Infant Powder Formula With IRON Meets All FDA Requirements for Infant Nutrition With the Added Benefit of Being Organic. The Earth's Best Brand Uses a Unique Formula That is Made Without Prohibited Synthetic Pesticides and Fertilizers. Nutritionally Complete, This Infant Formula Provides the Essential Nutrients Required by the FDA for Infant Feeding for Babies During the First 12 Months of Life. This Product Is Available in a 23.2 Oz Can.

Comments or Questions? Call Our Customer Service At 800 434 4246.

All Infant Formulas Sold in the U.S. Meet FDA Requirements.

the Brand Story Is Addressed in the From the Manufacturer Section on the Page. This Is the Text: Nurture Your Growing Baby With Wholesome, Organic Products From the Earth's Best Organic Brand.

Introduced Over 30 Years Ago; the Earth's Best Brand Was the First Complete Line of Organic Infant Nutrition. Today, You Can Find Better for Baby Products From Organic Formula, Infant Cereals, Jarred Baby Food to Chlorine Free Diapers and Wipes, Baby Body Care Products, Snacks and Meals for Growing Toddlers and Kids.
feature_bullets: Organic formula that is easy to digest and nutritionally complete for baby's first twelve months
All lactose milk based powder formulation; our closest formula to breast milk, no added corn syrup solids
Omega 3 DHA and Omega 6 ARA fatty acids naturally found in breast milk to support brain and eye development, Iron for healthy development
With Lutein for Eyes and Prebiotic Fructooligosaccharides for Immunity
Non-GMO ingredients and Kosher; Made without prohibited synthetic pesticides and fertilizers. No artificial growth hormones

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
